name: The Spirit Stone (billsmugs)
description:
Oh no, you're dead! 👻

Luckily you can fix that if you get your hands on the Spirit Stone. Unfortunately it's broken into five pieces...

This is an English translation of Kiwen Kon, originally written in Toki Pona. If you can read Toki Pona, that version is recommended!


This game only works on the Playdate console.
